publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1486 Mrs Nanette Milne: Congratulations to the British Pipe Band Championships Held at Turriff—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers of the British Pipe Band Championships held in Turriff, Aberdeenshire, on Saturday 12 June 2004 for arranging a spectacular day’s entertainment involving in excess of 3,000 pipers, drummers and highland dancers; further congratulates, not only the winners, but all performers for giving their best in front of an audience of 20,000 people and welcomes the huge economic benefit that the championships have brought to businesses in Aberdeenshire, and hopes that the championships will return to Turriff in the near future.

S2M-1486 Congratulations to the British Pipe Band Championships Held at Turriff (lodged on 16 June 2004) Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Richard Lochhead*, Brian Adam*, Murdo Fraser*, Bill Aitken*, Eleanor Scott*

S2M-1486 Mrs Nanette Milne: Congratulations to the British Pipe Band Championships Held at Turriff-That the Parliament congratulates the organisers of the British Pipe Band Championships held in Turriff, Aberdeenshire, on Saturday 12 June 2004 for arranging a spectacular day's entertainment involving in excess of 3,000 pipers, drummers and highland dancers; further congratulates, not only the winners, but all performers for giving their best in front of an audience of 20,000 people and welcomes the huge economic benefit that the championships have brought to businesses in Aberdeenshire, and hopes that the championships will return to Turriff in the near future. Supported by: Mr Ted Brocklebank, Bruce Crawford, Mr David Davidson, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Richard Lochhead, Brian Adam, Murdo Fraser, Bill Aitken, Eleanor Scott, Mr Jamie Stone*, Tommy Sheridan*, Ms Sandra White*, Stewart Stevenson*
S2M-1486 Congratulations to the British Pipe Band Championships Held at Turriff (lodged on 16 June 2004) Robin Harper*, Mark Ballard*, Rob Gibson*, Tricia Marwick*
S2M-1486 Congratulations to the British Pipe Band Championships Held at Turriff (lodged on 16 June 2004) Donald Gorrie*, Dr Jean Turner*, Mary Scanlon*
S2M-1486 Congratulations to the British Pipe Band Championships Held at Turriff (lodged on 16 June 2004) Nora Radcliffe*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-1486 Congratulations to the British Pipe Band Championships Held at Turriff (lodged on 16 June 2004) Carolyn Leckie*
